```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(ggplot2)
```

## Plotting in ggplot2

Here we will show an example of plotting with the ggplot2 library. First let's

### Define the data

```{r data}
data <- data.frame(x = 1:10,
                   y = 10:1)
summary(data)
```

### Plot the data

Now we can plot it

```{r ggplot, echo=FALSE}
ggplot(data) +
  aes(x = x, y = y) + 
  geom_point()
```

All done! :-)
